response.overview: Lawrence Talbot, an American man on a visit to Victorian London to make amends with his estranged father, gets bitten by a werewolf and, after a moonlight transformation, leaves him with a savage hunger for flesh.
response.tagline: When the moon is full, the legend comes to life.
response.title: The Wolfman
